availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Maben A. Dinwiddie (Allen County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Allen County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Bishop Harris Dinwiddie in Allen County, Kentucky, on August 10, 1844. Father of Robert T. Dinwiddie, M. D. Dinwiddie, Mary B. Dinwiddie, and Sarah Percilla Dinwiddie. Farmer in Allen County in 1850. Farmer in Allen County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Allen County, p. 223B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Allen County, Scottsville, p. 330.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Allen County, Scottsville, p. 331.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994027, Allen County Births.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Allen County Marriages, Film #000851644, p. 32.
